description:
The unique design of this stretchy, soft balaclava makes it a versatile warmer on chilly winter days.

  • Made of 37% nylon face, backed with 60% polyester, 3% spandex 100-weight Motion Fleece®
  • Smooth face fabric sheds snow; brushed interior wicks warmth, provides breathability
  • Flat-locked seams for comfort
  • Hood hinges back so it can be worn as a balaclava, a neck warmer, or a beanie
name: Outdoor Research Alpine Fleece Balaclava - Children to Youths
